item.title: GitHub changes - user name
item.description: I have changed my GitHub user name to more meaningful name. ðŸ˜ƒ What happens when I change my username? Also spent some time to clean up my GitHub account and set up all the remote links to the repositories. First I have listed my existing remotes to get the names e.g. go to the local repository folder and run the command git remote -v $ git remote -v origin https://github.
